root.message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 3-9-2, translated into en
root.data: Draft estimates are reviewed with Member States through a WHO country consultation process and SDG focal points every time new data are generated. In addition, the methods and data are published in a peer-reviewed journal. 2016 estimates were published in 2019 (see 4.c.), and the manuscript for the 2019 estimates presently being submitted is currently under development, with plans for submission to a peer-reviewed journal by April 2022.
